Securus Pattern Library

The CSS and assets that power the Securus NextGen Platform

Read the Docs

What is the Securus Pattern Library?

The Securus Pattern Library is a unified pattern library for all new Securus NextGen applications. It provides all the CSS, HTML snippets, fonts, icons, and images you need to build a User Interface.

Read More About the Securus Pattern Library →

How Do I Use It?

The Securus Pattern Library requires the use of node/npm in your application. Including your assets is as simple as an npm install command.

Get Started Using the Securus Pattern Library →

Need Some Changes?

The Securus Pattern Library is built as an internal open source project. Any Securus team members who encounter bugs or need new features can submit a Pull Request on GitHub
